Dataloaders for AffSpec¶

AffSpec Transform¶

class dataloader.custom_transforms.FaceCrop(scale=1.3)[source]¶

Crop the face region from an image

Parameters

scale (float) – The scale is numerical ratio for cropping the face. e.g. If it is greater than 1, then the cropped face will be bigger than the detected face (crop more in backgrounds) If it is smaller than 1, then the cropped face will be smaller than the detected face (hair, chin, etc are cropped away)

Returns

the PIL image.

Return type

image (Image.array)
